title: Implement Secure User Login
description: As a user, I want to securely log in using unique credentials, so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Unique username and password; compliance with security standards; session timeout.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must enter unique credentials to log in. 2. Session timeout after inactivity.
test_cases: Given a user, when the user enters unique credentials, then they can log in securely.

title: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account security is enhanced.
attributes_and_rules: Support for different MFA methods, including SMS and authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria: 1. MFA setup during login. 2. Users must verify via a second factor.
test_cases: Given a user, when MFA is enabled, then the user must verify their login with a second factor.

title: Implement Data Encryption
description: As a user, I want my sensitive data to be encrypted, so that it remains secure and private.
attributes_and_rules: Encryption standards compliance; sensitive data encrypted at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Encrypt user data at rest. 2. Encrypt data in transit.
test_cases: Given sensitive data, when data is stored or transmitted, then it must be encrypted.

title: Design Personalized User Dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see all my relevant banking products and services at a glance.
attributes_and_rules: Display products and services based on user profile and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Display personalized information on the dashboard. 2. Quick access to key features.
test_cases: Given a user profile, when the user logs in, then the dashboard displays personalized banking information.

title: Develop Responsive Interface
description: As a user, I want a consistent interface across devices, so that I have a seamless experience regardless of my device.
attributes_and_rules: Adaptive UI design; consistency in layout and behavior across devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Responsive design on desktop, tablet, and mobile. 2. Consistent user experience.
test_cases: Given a user, when using the portal on any device, then the interface must adapt and provide a seamless experience.

title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
description: As an inclusive bank, I want to adhere to accessibility standards, so that all users, including those with disabilities, can easily navigate the interface.
attributes_and_rules: Compliance with WCAG; support for screen readers and accessible navigation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Interface meets WCAG standards. 2. Supports screen readers and keyboard navigation.
test_cases: Given an accessibility requirement, when a user navigates the portal, then the interface meets accessibility standards.
